Kankheyya Sutta：The Sākyan Mahānāma visits Lomasavangīsa at the Nigrodhārāma in Kapilavatthu and asks him if the learner’s way of life is the same as that of a Tathāgata．No，says the Elder； a learner strives to abandon the five hindrances （nīvarana）； the arahants have already completely destroyed them．S．v．327f．
